Title: Relates to the creation of a community doula expansion grant program
Summary: Creates a community doula expansion grant program to support community-based doulas and community-based doula organizations; provides funding for recruitment, training, licensing, supporting, and/or mentoring of community-based doulas.
LawCode: Add Art 25 Title 3-A §§2560 - 2563, Pub Health L; add §99-rr, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the creation of a community doula expansion grant program; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the community doula expansion grant program fund
